title: Prof. Dr. Md. Moklesur Rahman Joins Evercare Hospital Chattogram
excerpt: Evercare Hospital Chattogram proudly announces the appointment of Prof. Dr. Md. Moklesur Rahman as Senior Consultant, General & Laparoscopic Surgery.
content: Prof. Dr. Md. Moklesur Rahman completed his MBBS from Chittagong Medical College in 1990 and later pursued his MS in General Surgery. He has more than three decades of clinical, academic, and research experience.

title: Evercare Hospital Chattogram Introduces Advanced Cardiac Care
excerpt: A new milestone in healthcare with the launch of state-of-the-art cardiac facilities.
content: The hospital has upgraded its Cath Lab and surgical units to provide 24/7 emergency cardiac support for patients in the Chattogram division.

title: Success Story: Complex Laparoscopic Surgery Performed
excerpt: Our surgical team successfully performed a minimally invasive procedure on a high-risk patient.
content: Led by senior consultants, the procedure ensured faster recovery and minimal scarring for the patient.

title: World Health Day Seminar at Evercare Chattogram
excerpt: Raising awareness about preventive healthcare through an interactive session with experts.
content: Doctors and community leaders gathered to discuss the importance of regular health check-ups and healthy lifestyle choices.

title: New Pediatric Wing Inaugurated
excerpt: Enhancing child healthcare services with specialized pediatric ICU and neonatal care.
content: The new wing is equipped with child-friendly environments and highly trained nursing staff for better recovery.

title: Evercare Receives International Excellence Award
excerpt: Recognized for clinical leadership and commitment to world-class healthcare standards.
content: This award reflects our dedication to patient safety and compassionate care in the region.

title: Free Health Screening Camp for Senior Citizens
excerpt: Providing free consultations and basic tests for elderly residents of Chattogram.
content: Over 500 seniors benefited from the camp, receiving specialized advice from geriatric experts.

title: Advanced Orthopedic Joint Replacement Center Opens
excerpt: Offering robotic-assisted surgeries for hip and knee replacements.
content: Our new center aims to reduce post-operative pain and improve mobility for patients with chronic joint issues.

title: Workshop on Modern Oncology Practices
excerpt: Global experts share insights on the latest advancements in cancer treatment.
content: The workshop focused on personalized medicine and targeted therapy for various types of cancer.

title: Evercare Chattogram Marks 5th Anniversary
excerpt: Celebrating five years of excellence in healthcare services in the port city.
content: The celebration included staff awards, patient testimonials, and a commitment to future expansions.

title: Diet & Nutrition: Public Awareness Program
excerpt: Expert dietitians share tips on managing chronic diseases through food.
content: Focusing on diabetic and hypertensive patients, this session helped many understand nutritional balance.

title: State-of-the-Art Radiology Department Upgrade
excerpt: Installing the latest MRI and CT scan machines for faster and more accurate diagnosis.
content: The new equipment reduces radiation exposure and provides high-resolution imaging for clinical precision.
